org.apparatus_templi.xml

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apparatus_templi.xml.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElementInterface

    public final class Controller
extends Object
implements ElementInterface
    A representation of a controller located in a remote module. The controller is expected to have a name and current status.
    Author:
    Jonathan Nelson

        public String getXml()
        Generate an XML representation of this controller. This XML data generated is incomplete on its own, and is expected to be wrapped into a container by the XmlFormatter.
